definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
to answer/to reply/Reply to: (in email header)
variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]
to answer/to reply/Reply to: (in email header)
variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]
to reply (to an accusation)/to defend one's dissertation
to answer questions (as teacher or consultant)/to clarify doubts

sentences.english: Fascinated, my eyes reverting from the south, dropt, to follow those.
sentences.chinese: 令人着迷，目转南方答之不及，低，那些落叶。

sentences.english: Jupiter, to stop questions, replied that it was a fresh creation from the earth.
sentences.chinese: 朱庇特唯恐她再追问下去就答说这是大地的新造物。

sentences.english: Unless they have a very, very good memory, they will not.
sentences.chinese: 除非他们记性非常好，否则他们答不出来。

sentences.english: So I questioned by your Chaplain-like eyes, I could not answer.
sentences.chinese: 以至于你的眼睛秋水般地呻问我的时候，我没有答。

sentences.english: The questions were answered by students in class yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 在昨天的课堂上，问题被学生答出。
彼得张口结舌答不上来。

sentences.english: Every one cannot answer the question.
sentences.chinese: 并非人人都能答得出这个问题。

sentences.english: The questions have been answered by students.
Can not answer the question, only to learn the knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 没有答不了的难题，只有学不完的知识。
雨滴答滴答地下个不停。

sentences.english: Did they get the question wrong because they don't know the material or because they don't know the language?
sentences.chinese: 他们答错题，是因为不了解授课内容呢还是不懂语言？

sentences.english: 'Of course I would,' Mr. Holland answered.
But how can we go to Beijing ?
sentences.chinese: 答出各种去北京的方式。

sentences.english: "I've had candidates ask if they can work part-time from home right off the bat, " Ms.
sentences.chinese: 有些应聘者一开端就答他们能不能在野上班。

sentences.english: And the sons of Shammai; Nadab, and Abishur.
sentences.chinese: 沙买的儿子是拿答，亚比述。

sentences.english: And what had she told him?

definition: to answer/to reply/Reply to: (in email header)
variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]
finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last
to question closely/to investigate in detail/to examine minutely/to get to the heart of the matter
